select.if: SELECT ID AS id, NICKNAME AS nickname, INTRO AS intro, PROFILE_NAME AS profile FROM MEMBER WHERE ID LIKE CONCAT ('%', #{searchWord}, '%') OR NICKNAME LIKE CONCAT ('%', #{searchWord}, '%')
SELECT ID AS id, NICKNAME AS nickname, PROFILE_NAME AS profile, BLOG_NAME AS blogName, INTRO AS intro FROM MEMBER WHERE BLOG_NAME LIKE CONCAT ('%', #{searchWord}, '%')

SELECT M.ID AS memberId, M.NICKNAME AS nickname, M.PROFILE_NAME AS profile, M.BLOG_NAME AS blogName, P.POST_ID AS postId, P.TITLE AS title, P.CONTENT AS content, P.THUMBNAIL AS thumbnail, date_format(P.REG_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS regDate FROM POST P JOIN MEMBER M ON P.MEMBER_ID = M.ID WHERE TITLE LIKE CONCAT ('%', #{searchWord}, '%') OR CONTENT LIKE CONCAT ('%', #{searchWord}, '%')
